item.title: Iran says cooperation deal with UN nuclear watchdog is void
item.description:
DUBAI (Reuters) -Iran has scrapped a cooperation deal that it signed with the UN nuclear watchdog IAEA in September, its Supreme National Security Council Secretary said on Monday, according to state media.

The statement came around three weeks after Iran's foreign minister, Abbas Araqchi, said Tehran would scrap the agreement, which let the IAEA resume inspections of its nuclear sites, if Western powers reinstated U.N. sanctions.

Those were reinstated last month.

item.title: Syria finance chief meets US, World Bank officials as Trump admin pushes more sanction relief
item.description: <!-- THEME DEBUG --> <!-- THEME HOOK: 'views_view_field' --> <!-- BEGIN OUTPUT from 'core/themes/stable9/templates/views/views-view-field.html.twig' --> Less than two weeks ago, the US Senate approved a measure to repeal the 2019 Caesar Syria Civilian Protection Act sanctions on Syria as part of its 2026 defense budget. <!-- END OUTPUT from 'core/themes/stable9/templates/views/views-view-field.html.twig' -->

item.title: Witkoff, Kushner in Israel to salvage Gaza ceasefire after series of flareups
item.description: <!-- THEME DEBUG --> <!-- THEME HOOK: 'views_view_field' --> <!-- BEGIN OUTPUT from 'core/themes/stable9/templates/views/views-view-field.html.twig' --> The Trump administration is stepping up pressure on Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu to maintain the ceasefire with Hamas and begin implementing the second phase of the US president's Gaza peace plan. <!-- END OUTPUT from 'core/themes/stable9/templates/views/views-view-field.html.twig' -->

item.title: Hamas says it will hand over body of Gaza hostage at 1700 GMT Monday
item.description:
CAIRO (Reuters) -Hamas' armed wing said on Monday it would hand over at 1700 GMT the remains of a hostage recovered a day earlier in Gaza.

(Reporting by Menna Alaa El-Din and Jaidaa Taha; editing by Mark Heinrich)

item.title: Iraq to keep some US military advisers despite troop pivot to Kurdistan region
item.description: <!-- THEME DEBUG --> <!-- THEME HOOK: 'views_view_field' --> <!-- BEGIN OUTPUT from 'core/themes/stable9/templates/views/views-view-field.html.twig' --> Iraq's Prime Minister Mohammed Shia al-Sudani said some 300 US military advisers would remain at a key base in the country's Anbar province to keep eyes-on ISIS activities in the Anbar desert and prevent the jihadist group's resurgence in the Euphrates River valley. <!-- END OUTPUT from 'core/themes/stable9/templates/views/views-view-field.html.twig' -->

item.title: Erdogan heads to Gulf as Turkey looks to ease energy dependence on Russia
item.description: <!-- THEME DEBUG --> <!-- THEME HOOK: 'views_view_field' --> <!-- BEGIN OUTPUT from 'core/themes/stable9/templates/views/views-view-field.html.twig' --> The Turkish president will visit Kuwait, Oman and Qatar to strengthen economic ties, boost regional diplomacy and sign a series of agreements. <!-- END OUTPUT from 'core/themes/stable9/templates/views/views-view-field.html.twig' -->

item.title: Shares in French bank BNP Paribas plummet after US verdict
item.description:
Shares in France's biggest bank, BNP Paribas, sank more than seven percent in trading on Monday, following a US court verdict late last week finding it liable for atrocities committed in Sudan.

A New York jury on Friday found the bank helped prop up the regime of former Sudanese ruler Omar al-Bashir, opening the way to compensation demands.

The eight-member jury sided with three plaintiffs originally from Sudan, awarding a total of $20.75 million in damages, after hearing testimony describing horrors committed by Sudanese soldiers and the Janjaweed militia.

item.title: Egypt overtakes Kuwait as MENA’s biggest LNG importer: What to know
item.description: <!-- THEME DEBUG --> <!-- THEME HOOK: 'views_view_field' --> <!-- BEGIN OUTPUT from 'core/themes/stable9/templates/views/views-view-field.html.twig' --> Last year, the North African country shifted from being a net exporter to a net importer of LNG, due to soaring demand and production declines. <!-- END OUTPUT from 'core/themes/stable9/templates/views/views-view-field.html.twig' -->
